alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 8:26AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG AFFECTING INTERSTATES 86 AND 84 THIS MORNING... Patchy dense fog has been observed on Interstate 86 from areas west of the cities of Pocatello and Chubbuck to the interchange with Interstate 84. This is making travel at normal highway speeds hazardous. The patchy and moving nature of the area of near zero visibility means that it can happen suddenly at any point on this portion of highway. The dense fog risk lasts through 11 AM MST today. Locations impacted include... Burley, American Falls, Heyburn, Neeley, American Falls Reservoir, southern Lake Walcott, Declo, Albion, Cold Water Rest Area, Pocatello Airport, Yale Rest Area, Massacre Rocks, Idahome, and Interstate 84 And 86 Junction. Visibilities can suddenly become near zero in the fog. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
